subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Jimmy Rollins broke up Matt Garza’s no-hit bid with a single in the seventh before fueling a seven-run outburst an inning later, helping the Philadelphia Phillies complete a four-game sweep of the host Milwaukee Brewers, 9-1.
snippet: Jimmy Rollins broke up Matt Garza’s no-hit bid with a single in the seventh before fueling a seven-run outburst an inning later, helping the Philadelphia Phillies complete a four-game sweep of the host Milwaukee Brewers, 9-1.
